page.title: 03CLOTHES
page.content: {Children below 11}yrs.__vest/Tshirt, pants, Tshirt,knitted sweater, skirt/jeans/dress,socks(fabric content of above natural or synthetic or natural & synthetic fibres) Shoes /trainers__leather or fabric upper, synthetic sole. Coat/anorak__ some wool+synthetic fibre or all man made fibre.{11-18yrs}__School uniform. Boy_ _pants,shirt,knitted sweater,socks, shoes.Girl__pants,bra,blouse,skirt, knitted sweater, socks,shoes.Leisure wear boy & girl__underwear + jeans, T shirt,jacket,trainers.{Adults work {wear}__varies with job __Farmer/manual _jeans,work trousers,overalls. Builder also wears safety helmet & farmer dust mask,ear defenders. Office worker_man, suit_woman,suit,blouse or skirt & blouse.Shop worker_overall like short coat as chosen by shop.{Adults outer {winter wear_ }coat/anorak as child's.
